divs: sighting detailsmy wife took several pictures of a very strong electrical storm, just across the road from our home, and when i downloaded it to our computer, i enhanced to picture of the cloud due to being so dark, i saw the strange lights. (it reminded me of when in 1976 \ 78 i saw two different ufo's and of in 1980 one was seen by larry mcalister over his home on broadway lake not more than 4 miles from my home.) my wife had taken the picture of the cloud due to being a "cotton-ball cloud" and no other clounds close by. 1. at home--watching storm pass in front of home 2.noticed object when enhanced on computer 3.a disc 4. several lights in a disc shape 5.just that the cloud was odd 6.didn't notice it leave also in another picture a funny light was going either down or up in our field
trends: There have been no other sightings in Starr
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: wife took picture of strong thunderstorm, after putting on computer saw lights
